semantic_identifier: [GOLD-4]: Define data model + API contract for editable positioning templates per segment
title: Define data model + API contract for editable positioning templates per segment

sections.text: Create the backend data model for segment-scoped positioning templates (e.g., value props, differentiators, proof points, objections) including versioning/audit fields and sensible defaults. Define and implement minimal CRUD API endpoints to fetch and update a segment’s template, with basic validation and authorization aligned to existing workspace access. Document the API payload schema for use by the UI in subsequent tickets.
